insertPassword.description: Text in the context menu of a password form field.

informPasswordNotStored.message: The passwort will not be stored
informPasswordNotStored.description: The info in the insert-password-popup that tells the user, that the password will not be stored.

informPasswordMemoryStored.message: The password will be stored in memory
informPasswordMemoryStored.description: The info in the insert-password-popup that tells the user, that the password will be stored in memory.

informPasswordDiskStored.message: The password will be stored on disk
informPasswordDiskStored.description: The info in the insert-password-popup that tells the user, that the password will be stored on disk.

optionsChangeValuesWarning.message: Warning! Changing this values will change all your used passwords!
optionsChangeValuesWarning.description: Warning on the settings page to inform the user, that changes will change all passwords

optionsSaveMasterPassword.description: Label on the select element to choose how to save the password

optionsSaveMasterPasswordNo.description: Option for select element to choose how to save the password -> answer: no

optionsSaveMasterPasswordSession.description: Option for select element to choose how to save the password -> answer: session

optionsSaveMasterPasswordDisk.description: Option for select element to choose how to save the password -> answer: disk

optionsUseLetters.description: Label for input element to choose the used letters.

optionsPasswordLength.description: Label for input element to choose length of the password.

optionsSubmit.description: Text on the button to submit the option form.

optionsReset.description: Text on the button to reset the option form.

passwordInputQuestion.description: Text on the password input popup that ask the user to enter the password

passwordInputControlCode.description: Label on the password input popup for the control code

passwordInputOpenOptionPage.description: Name of the link to the option page to change the way the password is stored

browserActionShowButtonShow.description: Lable of the show button in its first state

browserActionShowButtonSure.description: Lable of the show button in its second state

browserActionShowButtonClear.description: Lable of the show button in its third state
